thinkin bout that one night when the world caught fire youre driving me crazy
baby and your eyes brightened up this dark scene

verse 1
we just facetime is this a sign im fallin out of your life
i try my hardest not to think about what i just realized
you said i was your light i think thats just a white lie
feelin so rotten inside thought i died
i kinda wanna go back im missin the pain
of a heartbreak and life just dont hit the same
im havin migrainеs my friends all over the placе
with their lifes straight i guess im afraid of growin out of my place

thinkin bout that one night when the world caught fire youre driving me crazy

these flames werent meant for you and me

ill make these roses all turn green

will fall into my dreams im drowning oh woah

outro
hey ive been thinkin bout you all damn day
and the sun is shinin on your face
i think i fell for you
i hate the fact that this is the truth
but okay oh oh
i know i might come off as strange
just swear im not im just in pain
please dont drive away from me5embed
